Uses of Class
javax.money.MonetaryException

Packages that use MonetaryException 
Package Description
javax.money
Main package of the Money and Currency API.
javax.money.convert
Defines the monetary currency conversion API.
javax.money.format
Money and Currency format API.

  • Uses of MonetaryException in javax.money

    Subclasses of MonetaryException in javax.money 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  UnknownCurrencyException
    Exception thrown when a currency code cannot be resolved into a CurrencyUnit.

  • Uses of MonetaryException in javax.money.convert

    Subclasses of MonetaryException in javax.money.convert 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CurrencyConversionException
    Exception thrown when a monetary conversion operation fails.

  • Uses of MonetaryException in javax.money.format

    Subclasses of MonetaryException in javax.money.format 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  MonetaryParseException
    Signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.
